aboutData.title: Hi There! I'm Yazan Abdullah
aboutData.subtitle: A Software Engineer
aboutData.text: I am a results-driven software engineer with a solid foundation in full-stack application development, specializing in creating responsive and user-centric web applications. With a proven track record in e-commerce projects, I excel in optimizing performance and seamlessly integrating payment gateways. I collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and am committed to continuous learning, staying abreast of industry trends to deliver innovative solutions aligned with clients' business objectives.

services.title: Software Engineer Lifecycle
services.text: As a software engineer i deal with the design, development, testing, and maintenance of software applications.

services.title: Database Management
services.text: Design optimized SQL databases to implement the pillars of DB infrastructure, Data Integreity, Data Consistency, Data Recovery (by including backups)

skillData.title: Gained Those Skills Working In The Software Engineering World Over the Past 2 Years
skillData.text: Learning new skills & developing my self espicially in a revolutionary field like the IT field is a must, previously my main focus was on learning new languages/frameworks which is not necessarily wrong, but the system design/archeticture should have priority and that's what focusing more on now.

portfolioItems.title: Wowly
portfolioItems.subTitle: Software/Cloud Development
portfolioItems.description: Built and deployed an application to the cloud ON s3 for static web hosting and an application load balancer and EC2 servers to host my backend as well as RDS to host my 'mysql' database

portfolioItems.title: Ecommerce App
portfolioItems.subTitle: Software Development
portfolioItems.description: The ecommerce app i made included the following: Seamless registration, login/logout, and password recovery. Intuitive product catalog with categorization, filtering, and dynamic search capabilities. Feature-rich shopping cart with streamlined item management and a smooth checkout process. Comprehensive user account management, encompassing profiles, order history, and wishlists. Implementation of a robust product reviews and ratings system.

portfolioItems.title: Food Delivery Webapp
portfolioItems.subTitle: Software Development
portfolioItems.description: A food delivery app built with reactjs including adming panel where you can manage reastaurant data such as users, menu, etc.. , and a restaurant panel so the owners of the restaurant can manage their own data as well, and a panel for customers who want to order with a checkout process.

portfolioItems.title: Blog Post
portfolioItems.subTitle: Software Development
portfolioItems.description: A blog app built with django with protected routes with admin panel where you can manage the the blog content and the users.
